content: a deceivingly easy colour work cowl reminiscent of stained glass windows creates a cozy double layer cowl knit in the round so no weaving in all those ends use as many or as few colours as you d like for your contrast colour fade just have fun pattern/yarn kits available through aberdeens wool keep your eye out for pre orders www aberdeenswool ca updated hey everyone thank you so much for all the love and feedback on this pattern i appreciate it so much and have updated the pattern to be more accurate this updated version is now in the kits as well thanks again with so much love and gratitude sydney
